thread.title: Doctor allegedly administers anaesthesia, molests stylist
thread.title_full: Doctor allegedly administers anaesthesia, molests stylist | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Doctor allegedly administers anaesthesia, molests stylist
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 04.27 am Representational image Hyderabad: A doctor at Geeta Medical Centre, Trimulgherry, allegedly tried to sexually harass a beautician who had approached him for skin treatment on Monday.
Dermatologist Dr Ganesh Mahadevan allegedly administered anaesthesia to the victim before trying to molest her. Luckily her fianc√© came to the clinic when she did not answer her phone and found her unconscious. She was later shifted to a hospital and is out of danger. The doctor is absconding.
The 21-year-old victim runs a beauty parlour in Lal Bazaar. Due to a skin problem, about a fortnight ago, she had gone to Dr Mahadevan, 58.
